Give your lips a light wash of color and lots of gloss with this iconic Lip Comfort Oil, but in an upgraded form, with the same sensorial goodness!

latestIgtvVideos.title: Happy International Women's Day!
latestIgtvVideos.caption:
“I believe in living life to the full, to being active and keeping things moving. That’s how I fully express who I am.” – Maribel Koucke, Surfer and Globe-trotter.

Today and every day, Clarins is proud to celebrate women all around the world for all that they do. Here’s to the women who inspire us, make us do better and be better. 
Happy International Women’s Day to the female superheroes you admire! ❤️

#Clarins #ClarinsIndia #InternationalWomensDay

latestPosts.caption:
Reveal your skin’s brightest potential with the Clarins Bright Plus [Advanced] range!🌟

Women noticed that their overall skin looked 42% brighter, with a decrease of 39% in overall dullness and decrease of 35% in visibility of dark spots after a month of use.
.
#Clarins #Clarinsindia #BrightPlus #NextLevelofBright

Glow brighter than ever with Clarins’ NEW Bright Plus [Advanced] Serum and Serum-in-Lotion!✨

Infused with supercharged Purple Tea, Acerola Seed extracts and Niacinamide, this duo boosts oxygenation for a radiant, even complexion. Say hello to brighter, healthier-looking skin!🌟

Ready for the next level of brightness?

#Clarins #Clarinsindia #BrightPlus #nextlevelofbright

latestPosts.caption:
Reach a new level of bright with Clarins Bright Plus!⁣
⁣
Experience a new era of radiance with the NEW Bright Plus [Advanced] Serum and Serum-in-Lotion! ⁣
⁣
Equipped with Clarins’ latest innovation, Evenness Boosting Technology, and powered by Purple Tea extract, the Bright Plus [Advanced] Serum and Serum-in-Lotion evens skin tone to reveal a beautifully, illuminated complexion. ⁣
⁣
Your glow, elevated.⁣

#Clarins #Clarinsindia #nextlevelofbright #Brightplus #serum

Great skin starts with a clean slate! 🧼✨

Wash away make-up, creams, and dead skin to reveal your natural radiance. 💖

#Clarins #Clarinsindia #ClarinsCleansing #FoamingCleansers #Skincare #SkincareRoutine

Our pledge for a beautiful tomorrow, blooming today.​ ​

latestPosts.caption:
✨ This is your sign to make your next weekend extra special! ✨
 
Treat yourself with some self-care magic using:
💧 Clarins Hydra-Essentiel HA Cream-Mask
👁️ Clarins Double Serum Eye
💋 Clarins Hydra-Essentiel Moisture Replenishing Lip Balm
 
Glow up, relax, and feel amazing! 💖🌿
 
#Clarins #ClarinsSkincare #SSBeauty #ShoppersStop #SelfCareGoals #ClarinsLove #SelfCare #BeautyYouCanTrust

Feel your feelings, flawlessly✨

Tears? Sweat? A full-on laugh-cry moment? Skin Illusion Full Coverage is totally unbothered.

💧 Emotion-proof
💦 Waterproof
🫶 Smudge-proof
🔥 Sweat-proof

It moves with you, keeps up with your mood swings, and still delivers smooth, breathable coverage - no cracks, no cake, just flawless skin all day.

Which emotion are you serving today? Drop it in the comments 👇

#Clarins #Clarinsindia #SkinIllusionFullCoverage #FullCoverageFoundation #MakeUp #ClarinsMakeUp

All the coverage, none of the weight ✨

Skin Illusion Full Coverage gives you that flawless finish without ever feeling like you’re wearing a thing.

It’s make-up that lets your skin breathe - so lightweight, you’ll forget it’s even there. That’s the power of foundation made for skin💫

#Clarins #clarinsindia #SkinIllusionFullCoverage #FullCoverageFoundation #SkincareMakeUp

Full coverage. Flawless finish. 24 hour hold. Zero compromise. ✨
 
The new Skin Illusion Full Coverage Foundation has launched to level up your beauty routine! Infused with Zinc Gluconate, it helps control shine and blemishes while keeping your skin looking effortlessly radiant. 💖

#Clarins #Clarinsindia #SkinIllusion #FullCoverageFoundation #NewMakeUpLaunch #ClarinsMakeUp
